data.displayName: Amber Plan + CBA: Variable Prices (estimate only)

fees.description: Membership of $19 per month (inc. GST) to access these wholesale rates.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date
An $11 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information

electricityContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, visit https://www.amber.com.au/terms. If you don�t have a smart meter we will install one for you. Available to residential customers in Evoenergy's distribution region with a flat rate tariff. For illustrative purposes, tariff 010 assumed. Our bill guarantee sets the maximum average rates we charge over a calendar quarter. For general usage this is 40.48c/kWh.

discounts.description: Monthly subscription fee of $19 waived for the first 6 months. Offer available to new residential customers who are also customers of Commonwealth Bank of Australia (CBA) and link their CBA credit card or bank account as Amber account payment method. Customers are not eligible to receive any remaining subscription free months if they cancel their Amber account, switch their payment method to a non-CBA account, or their CBA card expires

electricityContract.variation: Prices are not fixed. Amber passes through wholesale electricity prices directly at the cost to us, this includes: wholesale energy costs, hedging costs, network charges (per kWh and per day), metering costs, environmental costs and carbon offset costs. The usage price and feed-in tariff here is an estimate based on an average of the last 9 months of wholesale prices. Annual price estimate includes Amber�s monthly subscription fee. Visit www.amber.com.au/how-it-works

greenPowerCharges.description: 100% GreenPower for 6.58 cents/kWh (inc. GST) option avaliable. See website for more information.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Feed-in tariff is an estimate based on the last 9 months of wholesale feed-in prices, with a guaranteed minimum of 0c/kWh over a financial year.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Amber Offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions.
